title: Oil Rises From Lowest Since October on Broader Market Optimism
description: Oil rallied from its lowest close in almost two months, buoyed by bullishness in broader financial markets.
content: Oil rallied from its lowest close in almost two months, buoyed by bullishness in broader financial markets.
